channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 10:21 Air alert in Kharkiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 10:21 Air alert in Kharkiv region. Follow further messages. #Kharkiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 10:20 Repulse of the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 10:20 Repulse of the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 10:05 Alarm repulse in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community
item.description: 🟡 10:05 Alarm repulse in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community#Харківська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 09:59 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for the evacuation of the civilian population - 0800339291
item.description: 🟠 09:59 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for the evacuation of the civilian population - 0800339291#Купянский_район This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 09:40 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take shelter!
